Item.comments: called from Grid Handler to read with Super User permissions
Item.method_code:
'System.Diagnostics.Debugger.Break() Dim thisItemType As String = Me.GetType() ' must be Document Collection
'item must have an item property named 'top_hierarchy_node_id'
Dim tableName As String = thisItemType.Replace(" ","_") Dim SQLstr As String = "SELECT TOP 1 " & tableName & ".top_hierarchy_node_id" SQLstr = SQLstr & "," & tableName & ".name" SQLstr = SQLstr & "," & tableName & ".generation" SQLstr = SQLstr & "," & tableName & ".is_released" SQLstr = SQLstr & "," & tableName & ".state" SQLstr = SQLstr & "," & tableName & ".document_hierarchy_icon" SQLstr = SQLstr & "," & tableName & ".document_hierarchy_icon_open" SQLstr = SQLstr & " FROM " & tableName SQLstr = SQLstr & " WHERE " & tableName & ".config_id IN " SQLstr = SQLstr & "(SELECT " & tableName & ".config_id FROM " & tableName SQLstr = SQLstr & " WHERE " & tableName & ".id='" & Me.getID() & "')" SQLstr = SQLstr & " AND " & tableName & ".generation like '%'" If Me.getProperty("is_released","0") = "1" Then SQLstr = SQLstr & " AND " & tableName & ".is_released='1'" Else SQLstr = SQLstr & " AND " & tableName & ".is_current='1'" End If SQLstr = SQLstr & " ORDER BY " & tableName & ".generation DESC"
Dim resItem As Item = Me.getInnovator().applySQL(SQLstr)
Return resItem
Item.name: Resolve Link to DocuHierarchy
